text: David and Dillion did a great job of washing windows-inside and out. The windows had years of pollen and dirt build up. Also pressure washed the deck. Everything they washed/pressured wash looks almost new. I would definitely recommend this company.

name: Joel Cornett
text: Sparkle confirmed our appointment the day before and the guys showed up on time and immediately began the job.  They were courteous, professional and answered all of our questions.  They pointed out a couple of little problems with our windows (thanks so much) and finished the job in fairly short order.  The results are dramatic and we are pleased with the service.  We will definitely call them again and will recommend Sparkle to neighbors and friends.  Thanks for everything guys!

name: Cassie Ball
text: We’ve done business with Sparkle for a few years now.  Brett Bodine is very reliable and they do a wonderful job.   Adam did a fantastic job on our windows.

name: Kevin Porter
text: Sparkle was one of the only companies I reached out to that quickly came to give me a quote on cleaning the exterior windows of my house. Brett, the owner, was very kind and personable on the phone. Kendrick and Blake came out and were punctual and professional. They did a great job! We will continue to use Sparkle in the future.

name: Stacy Howorth
text: It is so nice to find a Company that actually exceeds your expectations! From the quote , communication and the actual work our experience with Sparkle was outstanding. Great Company to work with. Will definitely use again. The two technicians worked so hard for hours in intense heat! Made it look easy and always had a smile on their faces. I so appreciate their hard work!

name: Cheryl Chisholm
text: Kendrick and Matt came out and were outstanding! They were on time, they were prepared, they were fast - and the windows and screens are fantastic now!  More than that, not only were they courteous, they were friendly; they are outgoing and put me at ease instantly.  I have an old, toothless Chi and a blind and deaf small-breed mix; of course, I tried to keep them out of the way - but both of them treated my dogs so sweetly.  They didn’t really have to do that, as some companies insist your pets be shut away from them while their employees are at your home.  The company, from the time I initially called them until they were finished and leaving, was professional.  The owner came out that day to give me an estimate (that would be written up and sent to me electronically), which I received and approved electronically the next day.  Later that day, the owner called to set up a day for the work.  It was an experience I’d recommend to anyone needing the kind of services they offer.

name: Cheryl Hagopian Layne
text: Adam and Kendrick were punctual, personable, and professional! They possess a great work ethic and do quality work. I am so very pleased with my beautifully sparkling-clean windows and with the entire experience. Sparkle should be very proud of these two employees - they represent the company very favorably!

text: Sparkle is the most professional and responsive window cleaning operation I have ever used. I recommend Sparkle to anyone needing the services they provide.

Ridiculous and rude.

resp.text:
Good evening Juana, I want to apologize for the incident earlier. I felt bad for making that Mistake and almost causing an accident. I told my employees I know I scared whoever was in the vehicle and I actually said sorry and threw my hand up (even though you couldn't see me or hear me). I have children too, so I know the feeling even if it wasn't children involved everyone's life is precious and
valuable. I'm sorry for that.  I wasn't on the phone nor was I speeding I was coming on to the highway off the bypass my lane was running out I was near the end a truck had moved over, so I started to move over as well to get on to the highway and you were in my blind spot I didn't see you. I am not a reckless driver nor would I ever risk lives intentionally, i didn't see you in my blind spot I looked twice and was seeing my lane running out, so when the truck moved over to let me in that's when I proceeded to move over not knowing you were back there. I'm happy everyone was and is safe. I do understand your frustration, I would've been to and have been in that situation before. However, I do truly feel you can forgive me for a mistake like I forgave them.

name: Val E
text:
Not satisfied!! I purchased a preowned home. I call The Maids and explained to them that the house was empty and In need of a deep clean (everything to be cleaned). I was told not to worry that everything would be cleaned. After they arrived, the manager said that she needed to increase the price $180 because I had a lot of kitchen cabinets. (They were already there, so I agreed).

As I did the walk through I was finding stuff that wasn’t cleaned and they were going back trying to clean it. After they left I looked over my house and OMG! My house was NOT CLEANED. My floors were still dirty, I swept and mopped and the mop water was Black. The bathrooms were NOT cleaned, refrigerator wasn’t cleaned, cabinets were not cleaned, dust and spider webs still remain in certain areas. It was so much that I discovered that wasn’t cleaned. I literally had to clean my house myself.  I do want to say that they did clean my baseboards and the plantation blinds. When I notified their office and sent pictures, they asked if I wanted them to come back out. My reply was NOooooooo. You have already shown me how you clean. So she did take off the $180 up-charge.  For the amount of money that I paid I was just expecting my house to be squeaky clean. I was highly disappointed. I just don’t want anyone else to make the same mistake of having high expectations from THE MAIDS.

resp.text: Val - My apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced with our company. We work hard to provide a professional, quality clean that we stand behind. In fact, we have a 100% satisfaction guarantee, which is why we offered to go back to take care of anything we may have missed and be certain you’re completely satisfied with our service. At The Maids, customer service is extremely important to us and we always strive for 100% customer satisfaction.  Please contact our office to let us know what we can do to get the issue resolved.

name: Maci Cobble
text: Service was awful very unprofessional when my home dried it was dirt still on my home. When I called to express my concern he cursed me out and yelled and also over talked me. Told me had to educate me like I was a child. When I asked could he comeback he told me NO!! Or give me half of my money back he refuse. Remind you he was 5hrs late from my appointment time. I refuse to use service again and do not recommend his business to anyone.

resp.text:
Hello Ms. Cobble,
Throughout our 10 years of being in business our company has always maintained a professional standard in conduct and workmanship. The interaction that you have detailed is very contrary to what our records indicate. While our technician did arrive late due to some issue with our equipment, he in fact communicated same.  At the time, you indicated that, that was in fact ok.
Whenever we engage prospective customers whether over the phone or in person we always go over their expectations i.e. what they want cleaned and how they would like to see it look. We are then able to guide their expectations based on our own expertise. In your interaction with our technician, Martez, he indicated that your home was in fact badly oxidized and that with pressure washing it may become more evident in some parts than others. He further explained that oxidation is not caused by pressure washing  but in your case it was because of aging paint.  At the end of the service, you indicated that everything was in fact 5 star quality and you did leave a 5 star review to indicate such. It is therefore, quite unsettling that weeks later, you would call making such accusations about our professionalism and conduct thus purposely defaming our company.
With that said, we cannot stand responsibility for an issue for which our workman was not culpable. We are truly sorry that we were not able to come to an amicable resolution.

I recommend Tsunami to transform your personal residences or your investment properties. They will give your property the face-lift it deserves to sell or rent quickly, or to just personally enjoy. Thank you Tsunami for such a great job.

L. McCauley
Formidable Group LLC

name: Katie Groom Balloch
text:
I had gifted myself a deep clean of my home for my birthday - and it was a wonderful gift! The team was prompt, efficient, and professional. They were so detail oriented - even folded the ends of the toilet paper and paper towels to a point - like Monica from Friends (haha!). I had hoped for that feeling from commercials were you see the sparkle when you walk in a clean room and you hear the *chime*, and I got it. They really worked as a team; I heard one of the gals ask how to do something, and another gal gave her a suggestion and even checked back to see if it worked. Very detail oriented.

They were also mindful of my working from home and my dog.

My place was cleaner than I even expected. Will recommend to everyone (I’m telling you, it’s Monica Geller clean), and I will definitely gift to myself again!

Shout out to Cierra, Latoya, and Kyla, the team I got. Thank you so very much.

text:
Every detail about this service was exceptional. I have lived in my apartment for six years and let a few things get away from me when cleaning. I've never had someone clean my home before, so was a little nervous about the experience but I was immediately set at ease with the customer service at the office and the Maids who came to my home.
Every inch of my home was clean and I could tell they took their time with the most troublesome spots. Within seconds of opening the door, The Maids were off to work, making the absolute best use of their time. They were very friendly and went above and beyond.  I was very impressed and can't wait to book another cleaning!

name: Christopher Coleman
text:
The only value this place gave me was knowing the value of my Ring camera. The "maids" came into my house stayed for 2 hours, charged $378 and stood around manipulating my thermostat. There were four people that came in, two that actually cleaned, one that stood and made sure the mop in her hand was upright and another that walked around with a vacuum strapped to her back for the entire time (nice hairdo by the way Pam).

The beauty of it was after they "cleaned", they left a note that they mopped three times when I watched them mop half the floor at best. All I can say is if you deal with this farce of a company, make sure you are aware of what you are getting into.

resp.text: Mr. Coleman – Thank you for using The Maids.  My apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced with our company.  We work hard to provide a professional, quality clean that we stand behind.  In fact, we have a 100% satisfaction guarantee.  I do not see your name in our records.  Please contact our office today, and we will be happy to send someone to your home to take care of anything we may have missed and be certain you’re completely satisfied with our service.  At The Maids, customer service is extremely important to us and we always strive for 100% customer satisfaction.  We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Kathy Senseman, Owner

The Maids is a very honest and reputable company. I've had a firsthand account of seeing this multiple times and it is a rare and very admirable thing today to see a business work so hard to make sure the client is 100% satisfied...going above and beyond when they didn't have to.

I've looked at other Birmingham cleaning services and none match the level of service and affordability that The Maids provide. I highly recommend The Maids to anyone that wants their home professionally cleaned every time.

name: Erica Lau
text: I scheduled an initial deep cleaning with The Maids, and did not rebook after the first cleaning. Overpriced and cleaning is average. They sent 3 people to clean a 2 bedroom + den apartment and it took over 2 ½ hours. After the cleaning, they called to let me know that they had accidentally gone over by 25 minutes wanted to charge me almost $100 over my initial quote. Needless to say, I have found a great housekeeper who can do all the work, in the same amount of time for ⅓ of the price.

resp.text:
Erica,
The price of our initial cleaning is always based on the size and condition of the property we are cleaning.  We give an estimate over the phone based on the client's information.  We offer a 100% unconditional guarantee.  I so wish you had chosen to have us stop back by if your cleaning was just average.  The Maids handles social security, workman's comp, insurance and bonding, health care, cleaning supplies, etc. therefore we cannot compete on price with individuals who do not have these expenses.  Please call me directly if I can be of assistance in the future.  Kathy Senseman, Owner

name: J C
text: Ridiculous. First, you play phone tag with a person for a day then they want to come and measure each square foot of carpet to be cleaned which required me to drive 30 miles to the home,which in the end was a waste of time. Then because a 10 foot square area of carpet had some heavy staining this person proceeds to give me an at least $1000 estimate and several days away till job is done! I dont care what you do to a carpet you're not going to get all the stain down into the pad out I don't care what someone tells you,short of replacement. Charging attorney fee rates is ridiculous, you're cleaning carpet for 2 or 3 hours without going to law school for 6 to 8 years. In my opinion he just didn't want to do the job. Also wanted like $1.15 a sq. ft to clean tile with over 500 ft. to be done. Again, it ain't that difficult and those prices must be from New York or Cali. After the rigamaroll I contacted another carpet cleaner,gave the number of rooms and approximate area to be cleaned OVER THE PHONE and they were out that afternoon, did a good job in 3 hours all for about $300.
